thag5.4:1.1_0: My mentor helped me to learn,
thag5.4:1.2_0: hoping I would practice those teachings.
thag5.4:1.4_0: I’ve done what had to be done.
thag5.4:2.2_0: witnessing it for myself, not based on hearsay.
thag5.4:2.3_0: With purified knowledge, free of doubt,
thag5.4:2.4_0: I declare it in your presence.
thag5.4:3.1_0: and I knew my past lives,
thag5.4:3.3_0: I’ve realized my own true goal
thag5.4:4.4_0: Now there is no further existence.
thag5.4:5.1_0: You advised me in noble observances;
thag5.4:5.3_0: Your instruction was not in vain—
thag5.4:5.4_0: I, your pupil, am fully trained.
